data.title: Salvatore Quasimodo (Author and Poet)
data.meta_description: Awarded the 1959 Nobel Prize in Literature for "his lyrical poetry, which with classical fire expresses the tragic experience of life in our own...
data.text:
Profession: Author and Poet

Biography: Awarded the 1959 Nobel Prize in Literature for "his lyrical poetry, which with classical fire expresses the tragic experience of life in our own times".

During his early career Quasimodo was part of the hermetic poetry movement in Italy.

After World War II his translation of classical poets strongly influenced his works.

Born: August 20, 1901

Birthplace: Modica, Italy

Generation: Greatest Generation

Chinese Zodiac: Ox

Star Sign: Leo
